page.title: 16Clubs in Sherburn-in-Elmet.
page.content: There are many different clubs in Sherburn that people of all ages attend in their spare time.There are clubs for girls and boys like Brownies and Guides and Cubs and Scouts, which provide games and adventures for children.Also clubs which are associated with the church like the Junior Club,Womens Fellowship and Ladies Circle.For younger children under school age there are play groups and nurseries.There are womens clubs for all ages which they can attend in their spare time,like Mothers Union and the Friendship Club.There are clubs for peoples hobbies;the Allotment Association,Ballet Classes,The Boghoppers Walking Club,Homing Society for pigeon enthusiasts,Local History and Railway Societies also Sam Smith's Old Brewery Band.The Church Hall is used.
